|rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 5 |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== [http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/WL500g_Deluxe Product page] ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wl500gd On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] (part numbers) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Asus_WL-500g_Deluxe On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] :The device is using a '''VIA''' VT6212L USB 2.0 controller. *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asus_routers Asus routers on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/hardware/asus ASUS routers on '''OpenWrt'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?1304-WL-500g-Deluxe-European-WL500g-Deluxe-first-pics/page2 ''Asus WL-500g Deluxe'' on '''wl500g''' forums]
